question: The weight of GSAT-17 communication Satellite launched by the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) is?
explanation: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) GSAT-17 communication Satellite onboard the Ariane-5 launch vehicle from the Guiana Space Center at French Guiana. Its weight is about 3,477-kg and will be placed in the Geostationary orbit which has a mission life of 15 years.
